com.iha.emulator.communication.server.ssl

Class ServerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.communication.server.ssl.ServerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageSender

    public class ServerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageSender
    Class supervising Server model, which holds information about server, and providing temporary server connection secured with SSL/TLS.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky
    See Also:
    com.iha.emulator.communication.server.ssl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerController(Server model)
      Creates new ServerController with given model and calls createSSLCertificate() to create SSL certificate and initiate SSL context

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void createSSLCertificate()
      Creates new certificate from certificate authority (loaded from file CA_CERT_PATH), creates KeyStore, TrustManager, initializes SSLContext and assigns it to sslContext for later use.
      void delete()
      Deletes server model from controller
      private void figureHostName()
      Gets domain name from Server.getIp() and assigns it to field hostName

      Gets server model

      Creates Dom4j XML element with information about server from assignedServer model.

      Method creates secure connection with server over SSL, sends message and returns server response for this message.
      void setModel(Server model)
      Sets server model
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns server name and ip as string (format: name/ip)

    • Method Detail

      • figureHostName

        private void figureHostName()
                     throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Gets domain name from Server.getIp() and assigns it to field hostName
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if cannot retrieve domain name for model's IP property

      • createSSLCertificate

        private void createSSLCertificate()
        Creates new certificate from certificate authority (loaded from file CA_CERT_PATH), creates KeyStore, TrustManager, initializes SSLContext and assigns it to sslContext for later use.

      • sendMessage

        public java.lang.String sendMessage(org.dom4j.Document message,
                                    ResponseTracker responseTracker,
                                    OutMessage.Type type)
                             throws WrongResponseException,
                                    java.io.IOException

        Method creates secure connection with server over SSL, sends message and returns server response for this message. Connection is closed, after method is finished. Additionally this method tracks response time with ResponseTracker given as parameter.

        Notes:

        • Emulator v2.0.5 and lower - doesn't verify hostname with certificate's common name
        Specified by:
        sendMessage in interface MessageSender
        Parameters:
        message - Dom4j XML document with message for server
        responseTracker - instance of class tracking server response time
        type - message type
        Returns:
        server response as string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - SSLSocket I/O error
        WrongResponseException - if socket reached end of stream while reading or socket is not valid (details in exception message)

      • saveToXml

        public org.dom4j.Element saveToXml(org.dom4j.Element rootElement)
        Creates Dom4j XML element with information about server from assignedServer model. This element is added to root element given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        rootElement - root Dom4j XML element for server
        Returns:
        server XML element
